DHheader.title: DH sources in Leviticus
DHheader.shortdescription: Documentary Hypothesis source markings from A.E.Friedman.
DHheader.description: Documentary Hypothesis (DH) source markings from Richard E. Friedman's "Who wrote the Bible, Second Edition", pages 246-253, 1997, have been added. These markings appear as the 's' attribute on each verse and are one of J, E, P, Dtr1, Dtr2, R, or Other. Friedman splits some verses between sources, the decision on where to split a verse in the Hebrew text has been made by the transcriber and should be regarded as tentative. Modified to count orthographic, rather than prosodic, words.
